page.title: 09Carnival Week
page.content: The Carnival Parade takes place each year on the first Wednesday in August. There are always many decorated floats, lots of people in fancy dress & several local bands. The whole week is devoted to Carnival activities. On the Saturday before the Parade King Carnival arrives by boat and at an evening of entertainment with sideshows and stalls etc the new Carnival Queen is chosen. The Fairy Queen is chosen at a similar entertainment and this and other events can include a Talent Competition, Pet Show & Donkey Derby etc. Two contests which are always held are the Wheelbarrow race from the top of the village to the beach and the Raft Race for home made rafts which is held in the Bay.
